ygData.subject: Re: Best 1H Slash Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: What are the best one handed slashing weapons, magical or non-magical, that everybody has come across or are actually using? And to repeat a question for topic
ygData.messageBody:
What are the best one handed slashing weapons, magical or non-magical, that
everybody has come across or are actually using? And to repeat a question
for topic I had yesterday, what range weapons can we use as Paladins?

I am level 16, and still using a Mino Axe for my 1H slashing and a Morning
Star when I want to do some 1H blunting.

Grod
Paladin Level 16
Innoruuk
